clock_pin.docs:
**, [Pin Schema](https://esphome.io/guides/configuration-types.html#config-pin-schema)**: The pin which SCLK is connected to.

*See also: [sm16716 Component/Hub](https://esphome.io/components/output/sm16716.html#configuration-variables)*

data_pin.docs:
**, [Pin Schema](https://esphome.io/guides/configuration-types.html#config-pin-schema)**: The pin used for MOSI.

*See also: [sm16716 Component/Hub](https://esphome.io/components/output/sm16716.html#configuration-variables)*

id.docs:
**, [ID](https://esphome.io/guides/configuration-types.html#config-id)**: The id to use for this `sm16716` component. Use this if you have multiple SM16716 chains connected at the same time.

*See also: [sm16716 Component/Hub](https://esphome.io/components/output/sm16716.html#configuration-variables)*

num_channels.docs:
**, int**: Total number of channels of the whole chain. Must be in range from 3 to 255. Defaults to 3.

*See also: [sm16716 Component/Hub](https://esphome.io/components/output/sm16716.html#configuration-variables)*

num_chips.docs:
**, int**: Number of chips in the chain. Must be in range from 1 to 85. Defaults to 1.

*See also: [sm16716 Component/Hub](https://esphome.io/components/output/sm16716.html#configuration-variables)*

channel.docs:
**, int**: Chose the channel of the SM16716 chain of this output component.

*See also: [sm16716 Output](https://esphome.io/components/output/sm16716.html#id1)*

id.docs:
**, [ID](https://esphome.io/guides/configuration-types.html#config-id)**: The id to use for this output component.

*See also: [sm16716 Output](https://esphome.io/components/output/sm16716.html#id1)*

sm16716_id.docs:
**, [ID](https://esphome.io/guides/configuration-types.html#config-id)**: Manually specify the ID of the [Component/Hub](https://esphome.io/components/output/sm16716.html#sm16716-component). Use this if you have multiple SM16716 chains you want to use at the same time.

*See also: [sm16716 Output](https://esphome.io/components/output/sm16716.html#id1)*
